body.name: Veemagni 10X Magnifying Glass with Light, 5 Color Modes Stepless Dimmable 2-in-1 Desk Lamp and Clamp, LED Lighted Magnifier with Light and Stand, Hands Free for Craft Hobby Painting Close Work - White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 18. Order within 8 hrs 17 mins
features: [Switch in the Head & Eye-Care] The button is placed in the head position. Reach out to adjust the light settings, you no longer need to bend down to find the location of the switch. The magnifier with light and stand is designed with a ring design and high-quality LEDs to provide even light for viewing and reading. Create an environment for books, cross-stitching, knitting, sewing, repairing, wood carving, painting, model piecing, and more.

[10X GLASS LENS] Collects the needs of people working at close work and aids vision to improve the quality of magnified detail. 4.3‘’ real glass lens covering a large field of view area and 10X magnification maintains clarity, no distortion, and true color performance. You can place the magnifying lamp where your eyes need it most, whether in the bedroom, study, or office. It is the perfect assistant for artists, architects, beauticians, sculptors, and others who need to focus on detailed work.

[Adjustable Lighting & 5 Color Modes] LED desk lamps have 5 color modes and 10 dimmable brightness. Meet your different color modes and brightness needs, allowing you to adjust the appropriate lighting and brightness while working. Magnifying desk lamps with memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used. Achieve the perfect lighting for needlework, coloring, puzzles, jewelry, models, sculpting, and other hobbies.

[2-in-1 Desk Lamp & Clamp Light] Magnifier lamp comes with a weighted base and C-clip. You can use the base as a table lamp, or attach the metal clamp to the edge of a flat surface (<2.1" thick) as a clip light. The clamp can be easily mounted on a table, shelf, or desk without any tools. Avoid carrying a heavy, uncomfortable magnifying glass when you're at your workbench/desktop. Free your hands to enjoy arts and hobbies such as crafting, painting, nail art, soldering, etc.

[Shop Confidence] The ring design used in the magnifier provides you with an even, soft light and a large area of illumination. This magnifying glass with light and stand is the perfect gift for people with vision problems and macular degeneration. It is also an ideal gift for yourself, the elderly, and friends. If, for any reason, you are not satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Family Gift: Perfect for Birthday gifts, Mother Day's Gifts, Thanksgiving gifts, Christmas gifts, New Year, and all Holiday gifts. Also good idea for grandmothers, grandfathers, moms, dads, wives, husbands, old friends and more. Convenient Switch Button The button is placed in the head position. Reach out to adjust the light settings, no longer need to bend down to find the location of the switch. 2-IN-1 Desk & Clamp Lamp: Can be used as a desk lamp or a clip lamp, it can be easily installed without any tools. Spring arm allow for precise positioning and keep stable tabletop High-Quality Magnifier: 4.3'' Real glass lens provides 10X magnification to see small details easily. Perfect magnifying glasses with light for close work. light with magnifying glass. magnifying glass for reading . magnifying glasses for close work 5 Color Modes & Stepless Dimmable: Providing ideal light levels for painting, sewing, jewelry making, jigsaw puzzles, cross-stitch, and knitting by different lighting modes and brightness options. Eye Protection: Soft LED for natural color and shadow-free magnification. The magnifying glass with light hands free won't make eyes fatigued staying in the light for a long time. Product Information: Color: White Light Source: LED Daylight Lamp Color Temperature: 5 color modes Material: Alloy and Glass Each Arm Length: 2*8.9 inch Magnifier Power: 10X Clip MAX opening size: 2.1 inch Glass Magnifier: 4.3 inch Rating Voltage: 110V/60Hz Product Packaging: 1 * LED Magnifying Lamp 1 x Desktop Base 1 * Metal Clamp 1 * AC 5V/2A Adapter 1 * Wipe Cloth 1 * User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my new favorite desk lamp.
reviews.reviewText: It has several lighting options for brightness and warmth, so it's good for an ambience as well as practicality. The lens is clear and crisp, and the desk weight is adequate for most applications. But the desk clamp is very good for a little more range. LOVE IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Material quality was a pleasant surprise along with solid construction and appearance. Not too large with easy control access and various lighting options.Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised, good quality magnification. Light was nice and bright. The flexible arms were shorter than I thought they would be

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really pleased with this lamp. It seems well designed and built, and I, at 78, find it very useful.
reviews.reviewText: I said it all in the headline. The reach is limited, but that what I need for a crowded desktop. I like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice light and magnifying lamp
reviews.reviewText: Like the different light changes, nice long neck to change directions..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lamp is great
reviews.reviewText: I love this magnifying light! You can honestly tell that it was made well and it looks amazing. It comes with 2 options. You can either clip it to your table or you can use the base to set it on your table or desk as the base is weighted so you don’t tip it over when you’re moving it! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Nice and sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for doing beads and love it and already shared with others. Will be buying one for my daughter next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great light and magnification for the price
reviews.reviewText: This works very well on my bench top for my jewelry metalsmithing. I am using the base because my bench doesn’t have enough clearance to use the clamp. It is very versatile in terms of movement making working much easier. My only comment is that, despite the base being heavy, if you extend the arm completely on a horizontal axis, it will tilt. I have place a heavy object on the base to prevent this. Obviously, not everyone is going to need to extend the base like I do but my bench is packed with tools so I need to do that.
